detailsOfAchievement: Actvities: Creation of an alternative model for a holistic and integrated development with a focus on economic growth and social justice. Documentation and study of indigenous knowledge of tribal and their cultural heritage. Conduction of micro-level experiment with the application of Science and Technology. Promotion of education and employment for the best utilization of human potentials and natural resources. Acting as an agent of change and bring about social transformation by universalizing education, economic reforms, health consciousness and socio-cultural awakening. Generate faith and confidence of the destitute and rural people, marginal farmers, landless laborers, artisans, youths, women and the children in the participatory planning and development process. Achievements: The 28 years of journey of Vikas Bharti Bishunpur has made a tremendous change in the attitudes of the tribal people of the rural area and helped in conserving the traditional values, preserving the natural resources and protecting the social and cultural heritage of the State of Jharkhand. Vikas Bharti Bishunpur has also been facilitated with many National Awards for its selfless public service. Few of them are: Indira Gandhi Priyadarshani Awardâ€“1991; Vivekananda Seva Awardâ€“1992; Yashwant Rao Kelker Awardâ€“1995, Swami Rama Humanitarian Award-2008 etc.

detailsOfAchievement: Our NGO Vikas Parishad works in the field of agriculture, education, health, environment and has achieved immense success in its objectives. It works in the collaboration with Nehru yuva kendra to encourage the youths. It works with NABARD in order to encourage the livelihood of farmers by carrying out programmes like SHGS, Farmers club, JLGs etc. It also carries the programme to spread financial literacy among the people. Moreover, it carries the rural development and agriculture development. It works for welfare of the senior citizen, youth, artist, child and women, girls, handicapped people, labour. We held campaign to avoid the addiction of smoking, alcohol, among youths. Development of handicrafts, khadi products is also the objective of NGO. National integration programme is also carried out by NGO. We to a large extent succeeded in development of 150 kissan panchayat kendra, 58 kissan clubs, 150 yuva vikas club. In field of financial literacy, approximately 5000 rural people are being awarded about the various bank facilities, KCC etc from which the rural people can be benefited with the introduction of Nukkad Natak, pamplets, Hoarding, wall painting, financial inclusion meeting and about 2 lakh people are being awarded about the financial literacy programme. With the introduction of farmer producer company we have linked 2000 farmers to the business and marketing arena with the help of NABARD. About 5000 people from SHGs, JLGs, and WSHGs, has achieved their business to earn their livelihood from programme like jute craft, goattery, poultry, crop production, vegetables cultivation, dairy etc.

detailsOfAchievement: VARDA is a grassroot level organization working tirelessly for the development of community in and around Palamau District, Jharkhand. It has crossed 10 years of voluntary service by supporting community in the field of education, health, hygiene and sanitation and livelihood promotion. As far as major achievement is concerned â€“ VARDA has established a formal school for poor and needy children and educating them since last 9 years. More than 500 children are being educated upto 8th standard. Apart from education, Physical psychological and mental developments of children are also taken care off. Around 2500 children of age group 6 to 14 years have been enrolled to government schools for continued education. VARDA has implemented various programs to bring improvement in the health status of women and children. More than 5000 rural women and children have been benefited by this health program. 120 SHGs have been formed and linked up with this health program to realize its benefits. Around 150000 rural populations have been fully acknowledged on the issues related to HIV AIDS. Apart from these activities like health and hygiene, safe water consumption, Environment conservation, Agriculture, Livelihood, etc has been supported a lot in improving the life of around 1500 families. Overall impact of the program and activities is quite effective. Majority of the women of the target areas are aware of HIV AIDS. Tremendous improvements in the health status of the target community are found. Women are empowered enough and actively participating to eradicate the community level social issues like â€“ Alcoholism, Child Abuse, Child labor, Witchcraft, Women Violence, Dowry, etc. The organization is working for the promotion and sustenance of the Tribal arts, & Culture. 1500 mixed fruit plantation has been done on community land to promote livelihood as an alternative source of income apart from agriculture. Community health services are being provided by the organization for the poor and marginalized people. Awareness has been brought up on health, hygiene, nutrition, safe delivery system, RCH, immunization, environment conservation, SGSY Training, Self Employment, Horticulture, watershed and modern agriculture farming and sanitation. In the field of convergence with government schemes majority of the target SHGs and their adult family members have been linked up with Job Cards, Maternity Benefit, Indira Awaas, Red and Yellow Cards Yozna. The organization has devoted team constituted of experts of Disaster management. It is often participating to support the sufferers of drought, famine and flood. Overall impact of the program and activities is effective and fruitful.
